name: Claimification
description: Extract claims, analyze meetings, verify facts, and map knowledge with AI-powered extraction skills
longDescription: Claimification provides comprehensive text analysis through three complementary systems: (1) Claim Extraction - a 4-stage pipeline that breaks text into atomic, verifiable facts; (2) Entity Relationship Mapping - builds knowledge graphs from unstructured text; (3) Specialized Skills & Agent - 8 extraction skills for analyzing meetings, communications, and documents, plus a meeting intelligence agent that systematically transforms notes into structured minutes.
features: Entity relationship mapping with knowledge graphs
8 specialized extraction skills (commitments, actions, decisions, risks, evidence, contradictions, uncertainty, audience)
Meeting intelligence agent for systematic note processing
2 MCP Servers for seamless Claude Code integration
useCases: AI Safety & Verification - Fact-check LLM outputs and detect contradictions
Meeting & Communication Management - Transform notes into actionable minutes
Legal & Compliance - Identify risks and validate claims in contracts
Research & Analysis - Build knowledge graphs and extract structured claims
Enterprise Workflows - Track commitments, actions, and decisions automatically
Content Quality Assurance - Validate evidence and adapt for different audiences
